text:
Hi, my name is Emmy, and welcome to the Ray 
Dashboard Walkthrough Series. In this video,

we're going to take a closer look at the "Actors" 
view. This view offers the ability to see all the

actors that currently exist or have existed 
in your cluster as well as their status.

So I can see here that I have the 
different states. I have these

same quick actions that you've seen in 
previous pages like logs, stack traces,

and flame graphs. And I can see some metadata 
associated with each of these actors.

When I click into each actor ID, I get a nice 
summary related to the actor as well as a task

history, so all of the tasks that are associated 
with that actor. I can go and take a look at the

logs for each of these tasks and find more 
information about the node, actor, and worker

ID associated with them. That covers the key 
features of the "Actors" tab in Ray Dashboard.

Check out our other videos in this series for 
more information, and thanks for watching!
